jp.pay.android

クラス Payjp.Companion

  • jp.pay.android.Payjp.Companion
  • 含まれているクラス:
    Payjp

    public static class Payjp.Companion

    • メソッドのサマリー

      すべてのメソッド インスタンス・メソッド concreteメソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      Payjp getInstance()
      Get singleton instance. You must call Payjp#init(String publicKey) or Payjp#init(PayjpConfiguration configuration) that create singleton instance if needed, before use it. You can also manage instance yourself with initialized by constructor.
      void handleCardFormResult(android.content.Intent data, PayjpCardFormResultCallback callback)
      Handle the result from the activity which is started by Payjp.startCardForm. Use this at Activity.onActivityResult in the activity that you call Payjp.startCardForm.
      Payjp init(java.lang.String publicKey)
      Initialize managed-singleton instance.
      Payjp init(PayjpConfiguration configuration)
      Initialize managed-singleton instance.
      void startCardForm(android.app.Activity activity, java.lang.Integer requestCode, TenantId tenant)
      Start card form screen from Activity.
      void startCardForm(NonExistentClass fragment, java.lang.Integer requestCode, TenantId tenant)
      Start card form screen from Fragment.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • getInstance

        public Payjp getInstance()

        Get singleton instance. You must call Payjp#init(String publicKey) or Payjp#init(PayjpConfiguration configuration) that create singleton instance if needed, before use it. You can also manage instance yourself with initialized by constructor.

        Payjp(PayjpConfiguration)

      • init

        public Payjp init(java.lang.String publicKey)

        Initialize managed-singleton instance.

        パラメータ:
        publicKey - public API Key. You must NOT use secret key.

      • init

        public Payjp init(PayjpConfiguration configuration)

        Initialize managed-singleton instance.

        パラメータ:
        configuration - configuration for class Payjp

      • startCardForm

        public void startCardForm(android.app.Activity activity,
                          java.lang.Integer requestCode,
                          TenantId tenant)

        Start card form screen from Activity.

        パラメータ:
        activity - activity
        requestCode - requestCode. The default is PayjpCardFormActivity.DEFAULT_CARD_FORM_REQUEST_CODE
        tenant - tenant (only for platformer)

      • startCardForm

        public void startCardForm(NonExistentClass fragment,
                          java.lang.Integer requestCode,
                          TenantId tenant)

        Start card form screen from Fragment.

        パラメータ:
        fragment - fragment
        requestCode - requestCode. The default is PayjpCardFormActivity.DEFAULT_CARD_FORM_REQUEST_CODE
        tenant - tenant (only for platformer)

      • handleCardFormResult

        public void handleCardFormResult(android.content.Intent data,
                                 PayjpCardFormResultCallback callback)

        Handle the result from the activity which is started by Payjp.startCardForm. Use this at Activity.onActivityResult in the activity that you call Payjp.startCardForm.

        パラメータ:
        data - the intent from Activity.onActivityResult.
        callback - you can get card token if it is success.
        関連項目:
        Payjp.startCardForm, Activity.onActivityResult, Payjp.startCardForm
